title: Review: Prologo AGX gravel saddles deliver performance & comfort, with options
content:
The Prologo AGX saddle line up is a three-saddle collection designed specifically for Adventure, Gravel and CX, with shapes for any type or ride or rider. Launched in 2020, the group uses specific design features that actually do seem optimized for off-road drop bar bikes, and they work. Prologo AGX saddle options & actual weights [â€¦]

The post Review: Prologo AGX gravel saddles deliver performance & comfort, with options appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Tyler Benedict
